'''2.8.2''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on August 29, 2023.

== Fixes ==
* Improvements & bug fixes for Bedrock & Java installation flow & messaging.
* Fixed bugs for Java [[Quick Play]].
* Fixed some Java skins bugs.
* {{bug|MCL-23496}} - Crowdin link in language progress toast no longer works.
* {{bug|MCL-23547}} - 'Soothing scene' video/audio will abruptly end when returning to the "Play" tab.
* {{bug|MCL-23662}} - The word "Owned" within a launcher string used for the Realms tab is untranslatable.
* {{bug|MCL-23675}} - Quick Play labels used for the Quick Play feature are untranslatable.
* {{bug|MCL-23677}} - The "QUICK PLAY" string in the Minecraft: Java Edition tab is untranslatable.</onlyinclude>
